noData.title: No Match Data Found
noData.description: No recent match history (last 10 games) exists for the linked account, or it hasn't been cached yet.

errors.puuidMissing: Account information incomplete (PUUID missing). Please re-link your account.

championsPage.title: All Champions
championsPage.subtitle: Performance statistics across all played champions

statsPage.title: DETAILED STATS & HISTORY
statsPage.noAccountDesc: Link your Riot Account in settings to view stats.
statsPage.unlockDesc: Get deep insights into your win rates, KDA trends, and performance metrics.
statsPage.noMatches: No matches found for this filter.

championDetail.noData: No recent data found for this champion.

tooltips.csDiff10: Difference in Creep Score (minions) at 10 minutes vs your lane opponent.
tooltips.goldDiff: Average Gold difference vs opponent per game.
tooltips.xpDiff: Experience difference vs opponent. Higher means you are out-leveling them.
tooltips.damageShare: Percentage of your team's total damage to champions that you dealt.
tooltips.killParticipation: Percentage of team kills you were involved in (Kills + Assists).
tooltips.powerSpikes: Win Rate based on game duration. Shows if you are better in Early, Mid, or Late game.
tooltips.matchupNote: Showing top 10 opponents by game count from recent match history.

premium.spikesDesc: See when you are strongest in the game.
premium.matchupDesc: Deep dive into your performance against specific champions.

aiCoaching.title: AI COACHING
aiCoaching.description: Get specific coaching on this match ({championName}). Ask Rion Coach about builds, positioning, and how to improve.

accountPage.title: ACCOUNT SETTINGS
accountPage.inputDescription: Enter your Riot ID to verify account ownership.
accountPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter Riot ID (e.g. Hide on bush#KR1)

verification.title: Identity Verification (Icon Auth)
verification.instruction: In the LoL client, change your profile icon to the specified icon on the right.

messages.formatError: Please enter Riot ID in 'Name#Tag' format (e.g. Hide on bush#KR1)

chatPage.premiumDesc: Chat with our advanced AI Coach to get personalized advice, build discussions, and improve your game knowledge.
chatPage.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete?
chatPage.selectOrStart: Select a chat history or start a new conversation.
chatPage.matchConsultPrompt: Please tell me how to improve from this match ({championName} {kda}).

featureGate.title: PREMIUM FEATURE
featureGate.defaultDesc: Upgrade to Premium to unlock this feature.

promoCard.title: UNLOCK PREMIUM
promoCard.description: Unlock unlimited AI coach analysis, detailed data, priority processing, and all features to help you improve.

header.subtitle: TIMELINE SYNC & VIDEO
header.description: Sync Riot match data with replay video for thorough AI coaching.

controls.selectVideo: Please select a video to analyze

micro.title: Micro Analysis (Vision)
micro.description: Analyzes 30 seconds from the specified point to evaluate kills/deaths and teamfights.
micro.noVideo: Please select a video to analyze (Local File recommended)
micro.youtubeNotSupported: YouTube Vision Analysis is coming soon. Please use a local file.

macro.questionPlaceholder: Ex: How was my positioning here?

analysis.verificationFailed:
Video verification failed.
The selected match does not match the video content.

results.matchVerificationErrorDetail: The selected match does not match the video content.
results.placeholder: Select a video file or enter a YouTube URL

LANING.label: Laning
LANING.desc: Early game CS, harass, gank avoidance

lpWidget.title: RANK PROGRESSION
lpWidget.unrankedDesc: Play ranked games to see LP progression

championPerformance.title: TOP CHAMPIONS
championPerformance.noDataDesc: Play matches to see your top performers

winCondition.what: Win rate for 3 key actions: First Blood, First Tower, Solo Kill.
winCondition.why: High win rate on these = your 'win pattern'. Focus on what you're good at.
winCondition.how: Target 60%+ win rate on these conditions to stabilize your overall win rate.

laningPhase.what: Evaluates your early game CS advantage and farming power in the first 10 minutes.
laningPhase.why: Out-farming your opponent is the most reliable way to build an item lead.
laningPhase.how: Aim for +10 CS lead over your lane opponent consistently.

nemesis.what: Champions you struggle against (Nemesis) vs champions you dominate (Prey).
nemesis.why: Useful for ban decisions and counter-pick strategies.
nemesis.how: Consider banning Nemesis champions instead of fighting them head-on.

clutch.what: Win rate in close games (<5k gold diff) and stomp games (>10k gold diff).
clutch.why: Close game win rate shows decision-making under pressure.
clutch.how: Aim for 50%+ close game win rate to consistently secure winnable games.

principle1.title: Gold = Power
principle1.description: LoL is a game where you earn gold, buy items, and become stronger. Even with the same champion, a gold difference creates an overwhelming power gap.

principle2.title: Every Action Has Value
principle2.description: Kills, CS, objectives... everything can be converted to gold. Gold efficiency is the criteria for deciding 'What should I do now?'

comparison.title: Value Benchmarks
comparison.killEqualsCsDesc: One kill is worth about 300g. That's equivalent to 15 minions.
comparison.plateEqualsWavesDesc: One tower plate is 175g. That's equivalent to 3 minion waves.
comparison.dragonEqualsKillDesc: Dragon value is a % buff. The effect increases as you get more items.

market.title: Gold Reference
market.description: A complete list of base gold values for all units and objectives on Summoner's Rift. Learn what you earn from each target.
market.growthTooltip: Gold value increases over time (+{growth}g every 90 seconds). Worth more in late game.

scalingDragon.title: The Power of Multiplication
scalingDragon.description: Dragon buffs enhance stats by percentage (%). This means they're weak early when you have few items, but their value skyrockets as you build more items.
scalingDragon.note: Think of it as a 'multiplier' that amplifies your team's final power, not just flat gold.

scalingFixed.title: Fixed Value (No Scaling)
scalingFixed.description: This objective's value is constant regardless of game time. The gold and buff effects are fixed, with no variation based on timing. The earlier you secure it, the longer you can leverage the advantage.

detail.defaultHow: Establish vision (wards) and start the objective when your laners have priority (pushed lanes). Always keep track of your Smite damage.
detail.defaultWhy: Securing this objective gives your entire team a stat advantage beyond the gold difference. The effect becomes more significant as the game progresses.
